name: linuxserver-webtop
description: docker-webtop provides a full Linux desktop environment in a browser via a Docker container. Itâ€™s ideal for remote GUI access, development environments, or lightweight workstation use.
features: Full desktop environment: Access a complete Linux desktop with KDE, XFCE, or other desktop environments in your browser.
Application support: Run GUI applications including browsers, IDEs, office suites, and development tools.
Persistent storage: Save files and settings that persist across container restarts for continuous workflows.
Multi-user access: Create isolated desktop environments for multiple users with separate configurations.
Copy-paste support: Transfer text and data between your local machine and the remote desktop seamlessly.
Audio support: Stream audio from desktop applications to your browser for multimedia applications.
File transfer: Upload and download files between your local system and the remote desktop environment.
Custom resolution: Adjust desktop resolution dynamically to match your browser window or display preferences.
Keyboard mapping: Use your local keyboard layout with proper key mapping for international users.
Clipboard sync: Synchronize clipboard content between local and remote environments for productivity.
Resource isolation: Run resource-intensive applications in containers without affecting your host system.
Quick deployment: Launch a full desktop environment in seconds using Docker with minimal configuration.
